Package data

Class WordGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.WordGroup

  • public class WordGroup
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a group of words having the same length.

      • addWord

        public void addWord​(Word word)
        Adds a word to the group. Increases number of vowels in the group on addition. Adds a vowels to the set of vowels in the group.
        Parameters:
        word - data.Word to be added to the group
